resources.string: Print the barcode on your coffee cup, scan it each time when you have a cup of coffee.
Snap the NFC Tag on your coffee cup, put your phone close to the cup before your drink it.
Import coffee drink records in CSV format. (to be done)
Export your drink record to SDCard. (to be done)
Build an "Add A Cup" NFC Tag
Bring a writable NFC Tag close to the phone.
Success to write the NFC Tag.
Error: The tag is NOT writable.
Error: Tag is too small, buy anther tag please.
NFC is disabled, enabled it from settings before make a NFC tag.
Your phone does NOT support NFC. This function need NFC.
